alert.note: Alert for Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 6:10PM PST until March 10 at 2:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 1000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 1000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except 4 to 7 inches above 2000 feet. * WHERE...Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...Until 2 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
